title: Microsoft Surface Pro (LCD) Copilot+ PC 12" 512GB Tablet with Snapdragon X Plus/16GB RAM (2025) - Violet - Device Only
description: Stay productive and creative, on the go, with this ultra-thin Microsoft Surface Pro 12" tablet. Light and flexible, you can use it as a tablet or turn it into a laptop for comfortable typing1. Featuring an immersive PixelSense Flow LCD touchscreen and Qualcomm Snapdragon X Plus processor, this machine helps you do more in less time. Plus, possibilities are endless with advanced AI capabilities.

title: Lenovo IdeaPad 1i 14" Laptop - Abyss Blue (Intel Celeron N4500/4GB RAM/128GB SSD/Windows 11)
description: Experience excellent performance with the Lenovo IdeaPad 1i laptop. Powered by the Intel Celeron N4500 processor and 4GB of RAM, this laptop lets you multitask efficiently. The 14-inch HD display offers clear, sharp visuals, while Dolby Audio speakers deliver rich, immersive sound.
